description:
React Website Egg - Complete Development & Production Solution

This egg clones any git repository containing a React/TypeScript project and provides three operational modes:
• Dev Mode: Runs 'npm run dev' with hot reloading for active development
• Build Mode: Runs 'npm run build' to compile production assets only
• Prod Mode: Runs 'npm run preview' to serve built files

Features:
• Git repository cloning with branch selection
• Auto dependency installation
• Configurable server port
• Development/Production mode switching
• Auto-update support
• Custom npm package installation

Perfect for Vite, or any React project.
startup:
if [ -f package.json ]; then npm install; fi
if [ "{{ NODE_ENV }}" == "0" ]; then
  echo "Starting in development mode"
  npm run dev
else
  echo "Starting in production mode"
  npm run build
  npm run start
fi

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# React Vite TSX Project Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

apt update
apt install -y git curl jq file unzip make gcc g++ python python-dev libtool

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

# Skip installation if user uploaded files manually
if [ "${USER_UPLOAD}" == "true" ] || [ "${USER_UPLOAD}" == "1" ]; then
    echo "User uploaded files manually, skipping install."
    exit 0
fi

# Ensure .git is at the end of repo URL
if [[ ${GIT_ADDRESS} != *.git ]]; then
    GIT_ADDRESS=${GIT_ADDRESS}.git
fi

# Handle private repo authentication
if [ -n "${USERNAME}" ] && [ -n "${ACCESS_TOKEN}" ]; then
    GIT_ADDRESS="https://${USERNAME}:${ACCESS_TOKEN}@$(echo -e ${GIT_ADDRESS} | cut -d/ -f3-)"
fi

# Clone or pull repo
if [ "$(ls -A /mnt/server)" ]; then
    echo "/mnt/server is not empty."
    if [ -d .git ] && [ -f .git/config ]; then
        ORIGIN=$(git config --get remote.origin.url)
        if [ "${ORIGIN}" == "${GIT_ADDRESS}" ]; then
            echo "Pulling latest from repo..."
            git pull
        else
            echo "Directory not matching repo, skipping git operations."
        fi
    else
        echo "No git config found, skipping git operations to avoid breaking files."
    fi
else
    echo "/mnt/server is empty, cloning repository..."
    if [ -z "${BRANCH}" ]; then
        git clone ${GIT_ADDRESS} .
    else
        git clone --single-branch --branch ${BRANCH} ${GIT_ADDRESS} .
    fi
fi

# Install extra Node packages if specified
if [[ ! -z ${NODE_PACKAGES} ]]; then
    echo "Installing extra npm packages: ${NODE_PACKAGES}"
    /usr/local/bin/npm install ${NODE_PACKAGES}
fi

# Install project dependencies
if [ -f package.json ]; then
    echo "Installing project dependencies..."
    /usr/local/bin/npm install
fi

echo "Installation complete."
exit 0
